de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Interface CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener

  • Enclosing class:
    CardSystemMonitor

    public static interface CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener
    A callback interface for events generated by the CardSystemMonitor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCardChanged(ICard card)
      The ICard.getState() has changed.
      void onCardInserted(ICard card)
      A new ICard is available in an ICardTerminal.
      void onCardRemoved(ICard card)
      An ICard is removed from an ICardTerminal.
      void onCardTerminalConnected(ICardTerminal terminal)
      A new ICardTerminal is connected to the system.
      void onCardTerminalDisconnected(ICardTerminal terminal)
      An ICardTerminal is disconnected from the system.
